questions.question: Q1. The purpose of the supporting electrolyte is to ___________ the conductivity of the solution.
Q2.Which of the following are used to make contact between nonmetal components of a circuit in a cell?

Q8. Which of the following is a conducting or semiconducting material that has been coated with a monomolecular, multi-molecular, ionic, or polymeric film?
